declarations.comments:
Unwrap Aff Signal.
If the order of the results is reversed, it is ignored.
declarations.title: useAff

declarations.comments: Subscribe to an event on an event target.
declarations.title: useEvent

declarations.comments: A hook that runs the given effect when the signal changes. (without initialize)
declarations.title: useUpdate

declarations.comments: Nub a Eq value of Signal.
declarations.title: nubEq

declarations.comments: Run a `Hooks` computation and return the result and a cleanup effect.
declarations.title: runHooks
